articles.author: Tomasz Nowakowski
articles.title: Research explores the properties of supernova remnant 1E 0102.2–7219 - Phys.org
articles.description: Using the Australia Telescope Compact Array (ATCA) and the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), an international team of astronomers has observed a supernova remnant known as 1E 0102.2–7219. Results of the study, presented October 27 in the Mo…
